text: Herbert Blöcker (1 January 1943 – 15 February 2014) was a German equestrian and Olympic medalist. He won a silver medal in eventing at the 1992 Summer Olympics in Barcelona. He was born in Schleswig-Holstein. In 2008, both he and his Olympic horse, "Feine Dame", were inducted into the International Association of Eventing Hall of Fame. He died of cancer in 2014 at age 71 at Elmshorn.Reitlegende Herbert Blöcker gestorben == References == == Other websites == * Category:1943 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Event riders Category:German equestrians Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Germany Category:Olympic silver medalists for Germany Category:Sportspeople from Schleswig-Holstein Category:Olympic equestrians for Germany
title: Herbert Blöcker
